title: Caodaism
summary: Caodaism (Vietnamese: Đạo Cao Đài, Chữ Nôm: 道高臺) is a monotheistic syncretic new religious movement[1] officially established in the city of Tây Ninh in southern Vietnam in 1926. The full name of the religion is Đại Đạo Tam Kỳ Phổ Độ (The Great Faith [for the] Third Universal Redemption).[2]
